original_text: Make sick people well again. Cause dead people to become alive again. If people have a bad disease of the skin, make them well again. Send bad spirits out of people to leave them. God has been very kind to you, so you should be kind to other people. When you help people, do not ask them for money.
korean_text: 병든 자를 고치며 죽은 자를 살리며 나병환자를 깨끗하게 하며 귀신을 쫓아내되 너희가 거저 받았으니 거저 주라

sentences.original_text: Cause dead people to become alive again
If people have a bad disease of the skin
Send bad spirits out of people to leave them
sentences.korean_translation: 나쁜 영들을 사람들에게서 보내어 그들이 떠나게 하라

sentences.original_text: God has been very kind to you
so you should be kind to other people
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너희도 다른 사람들에게 친절해야 한다

sentences.original_text: do not ask them for money
